property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on Archives. If successful, instead of accessing cards you may install a program from your heap, ignoring all costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2[Credits]: Break ice subroutine. X is the number of virus counters on Darwin. When your turn begins, you may pay 1[Credits] to place 1 virus counter on Darwin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install only if you made a successful run on a central server this turn. If you are tagged, Data Leak Reversal gains "[Click]: The Corp trashes the top card of R&D."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A two-way solution to a one-way problem, the data leak reversal, or DLR for short, is a misnomer. There is no actual reversal of data, only the creation of a parallel peer-to-peer link with the initial source.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 0[Credits]: Break sentry subroutine. 1[Credits]: +1 strength. When an encounter with a piece of ice in which you used Faerie to break a subroutine ends, trash Faerie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Do you believe in faeries?

property.name: Instructions
property.value: 0 [Credits]: Break sentry subroutine||1 [Credits]: +1 strength

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Draw 2 cards. Add 1 of these cards to the bottom of your stack.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We're always happy to help, Mr. Santiago." "I appreciate it, Mr. Li." "We'll be in touch. And, Gabriel..." "Yes?" "Don't leave town."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on R&D. If successful, instead of accessing cards you may look at the top 5 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A little corporate restructuring is necessary once in a while.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you access cards from R&D, access 1 additional card from R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Works best at your own desk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, place 1 virus counter on Deep Thought. If there are at least 3 virus counters on Deep Thought, it gains "When your turn begins, you may look at the top card of R&D."

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2[Credits]: Avoid 1 tag. Trash New Angeles City Hall when you steal an agenda.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "New Angeles is the jewel of modern civilization, and its government the envy of nations." -Mayor Wells

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner may spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Eli 1.0. [Subroutine] End the run. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That's against the rules. The Creators will be angry."

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner may spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Eli 1.0. [Subroutine] End the run. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That's against the rules. The Creators will be angry."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to make a run on this server, the Runner must spend [Click]. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Known for luxury hoppers and a delectable sauerkraut.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ronin can be advanced. If there are at least 4 advancement tokens on Ronin, it gains "[Click], [Trash]: Do 3 net damage."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I will serve you...for a time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Once per run, when the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may swap that ice with a piece of ice from HQ. The new ice is installed unrezzed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Looks like someone is being naughty..."

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: The World is Yours

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: *Some restrictions may apply. Scan this card to find out more.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Project Beale, place 1 agenda counter on it for every 2 advancement tokens on it over 3. Project Beale is worth 1 additional agenda point for each agenda counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Runner stole an agenda during his or her last turn. Trace6– If successful, give the Runner tags equal to the amount by which your trace strength exceeded his or her link strength.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine]Trace6– If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware, do 2 meat damage (cannot be prevented), and end the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bright light blossomed, and then the console went dark. That's when she smelled smoke.

property.name: Instructions
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace 6. If successful, do 2 unpreventable meat damage, and end the run.||(If Trace Successful) Trash 1 targeted piece of hardware.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the Runner is tagged, Dedicated Response Team gains "Whenever a successful run ends, do 2 meat damage."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They don't call them dedicated for nothing

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Subroutine] Trace0– If successful, the Runner trashes 1 program.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I had to describe the bugs in one word, it would be '****ing annoying.'" -Whizzard

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have at least 7[Credits] when you score Corporate War, gain 7[Credits]; otherwise, lose all credits in your credit pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There were several ways to win a corporate war. One of them was to bring the bazookas.
